name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Experienced Senior Node.js Engineer with 8 years of full-stack development expertise, specializing in **Node.js**, **React**, and **CI/CD** automation. I possess robust skills in building scalable applications, employing modern tools and frameworks such as **Docker**, alongside a strong emphasis on infrastructure-as-code best practices to ensure efficient deployment and management. My experience in implementing **OAuth2**, **SAML**, and **SSO** enhances my capability in developing secure and compliant applications. 

Proficient in RESTful services, I have successfully led projects in the healthcare and financial sectors, ensuring adherence to compliance standards including HIPAA and PCI DSS. I couple this with my strong background in **debugging** and **documentation**, facilitating effective communication within development teams. With hands-on experience in integrating microservices architecture and event-driven systems, I focus on building high-performance solutions that leverage my comprehensive technical stack, including **FastAPI** and **Django**.
